means: 使能够，提供做…的权利[措施]

word_mean: 恢复正常操作，启动，允许(操作)，启用，使能(够)[E,ENBL]

sentence.Network_en: This committee will enable decisions to be made democratically.
sentence.Network_cn: 该委员会将实现民主决议过程。

sentence.Network_en: The vote will enable the Prime Minister to push through tough policies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次投票将使首相能够力行强硬政策。

sentence.Network_en: The sessions will enable you to discuss problems with fellow asthma sufferers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些环节让你和其他哮喘病患者一起讨论问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as inable): from en-, in-, + able

encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 enable 英音：[in'eibl]美音：[in'ebl] vt. 1. 使能够，使锛埑晌級可能，使可行，使容易，使有效，使实现； （enable sb. to do ) 例句：Aeronautics enables us to overcome great distances. 航空学使我们能征服远距离。 The bird's large wings enable it to fly. （enable sb to do something） 这鸟的大翅膀使它能飞。 2.为（做某事）提供手段（或条件、机会等）； 例句：This dictionary enables us to understa

entry.def: If someone or something enables you to do a particular thing, they give you the opportunity to do it.

example.ex: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
example.tran: 新的检测手段应该能够使医生们尽早查出这种疾病。

example.ex: ...a new charter for training to enable young people to make the most of their potential.
example.tran: 能够使年轻人充分发挥潜能的新培训规章

entry.def: To enable something to happen means to make it possible for it to happen.

example.ex: The hot sun enables the grapes to reach optimum ripeness...
example.tran: 炙热的阳光使葡萄能够达到最佳成熟状态。

example.ex: A series of holes in the side panels enables the position of the shelves to be adjusted...
example.tran: 通过侧板上的一系列小孔可以对隔板位置进行调整。

entry.def: To enable someone to do something means to give them permission or the right to do it.

example.ex: The republic's legislation enables young people to do a form of alternative service.
example.tran: 共和国的法律允许年轻人服某种形式的替代役。

means.word_mean: 1. render capable or able for some task;

sentences.sentence: "This skill will enable you to find a job on Wall Street"
"The rope enables you to secure yourself when you climb the mountain"

auth_sentence.content: So everyone's trying their utmost to enable buyers.
auth_sentence.res_content: So everyone's trying their utmost to enable buyers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So everyone's trying their utmost to enable buyers.

auth_sentence.content: Create skunk works to enable creativity and new ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Create skunk works to enable creativity and new ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Create skunk works to enable creativity and new ideas.

auth_sentence.content: But how did feathers get long enough to enable flight?
auth_sentence.res_content: But how did feathers get long enough to enable flight?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But how did feathers get long enough to enable flight?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有[能力、时间、知识等]做某事,有本事的
stems_affixes.word_buile: abl能力→adj.有[能力、时间、知识等]做某事,有本事的
un无+able有能力的→adj.不能的, 不会的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使残废, 使失去能力, 丧失能力
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis去掉+able有能力的→v.使残废, 使失去能力, 丧失能力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使能够, 授予权利或方法
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+able有能力的→v.使能够, 授予权利或方法

Sentence.sentence: But as the nursing shortage worsens, a growing number of schools and hospitals are establishing "fast-track programs" that enable college graduates with no nursing experience to become registered nurses with only a year or so of specialized training.
Airbnb is a website that enables owners and renters to complete transactions online.
To enable them to learn to take responsibility.
You might have thought any tool which enables a writer to get words on to the page would be an advantage
It enables people to look into various possibilities and choose the career they love
Writer friends of mine pay good money to get the Freedom software that enables them to disable the very Internet connections that seemed so emancipating not long ago.

means.word_mean: 使能够; 提供做…的权利[措施]; 使有机会

sentences.en: A majority vote enabled the passage of the resolution.
sentences.cn: 多数人投赞成票使议案得以通过。

sentences.en: This pass enables me to travel half-price on trains.
sentences.cn: 我用这张通行证可以半价乘火车。

means.word_mean: 使可能; 使成为可能; 使可行; 使实现

sentences.en: This dictionary will enable better international understanding.
sentences.cn: 这部辞典将促进国际间更好的理解。

jushi.english: A majority vote enabled the passage of the resolution.
jushi.chinese: 多数人投赞成票,这使议案得以通过。

jushi.english: This dictionary will enable better international understanding.
jushi.chinese: 这部辞典将使国际间更好的理解成为可能。

jushi.english: The shell has to be slightly porous to enable oxygen to pass in.
jushi.chinese: 外壳不得不有些细小的孔以便能使氧气通过。
